nodes.text: The Desander Section was a suburb of Tazan City on the Expansion Region planet Tazan. It was located on the outskirts of the city, just outside of the Old Town and adjacent to the Lysander Section. It was a low-income residential area, but was reasonably respectable, located half a kilometer from the Tazan starport. Most houses in the section were built with stone, and it was home to Willer Clines, a Rebel sympathizer.
